text: Placid is an unincorporated community in McCulloch County, Texas. ==History== A post office called Placid was established in 1908, and remained in operation until 1965. The community was so named on account of the tranquility of the original site. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in McCulloch County, Texas Category:Unincorporated communities in Texas
title: Placid, Texas
